Name: Santa Sling
About the game: Santa Sling is a first-person VR where you play as Santa delivering presents to kids from your sleigh in a Christmas-themed town. Use your magic slingshot to target chimneys before Christmas Eve ends! Earn bonus points by launching the presents through the rings. Features - Fully Christmas themed, highly polished town and music - Three different scenarios to deliver happiness to - Precision scoring: hit the rings for bonus points! - A vast range of toys that you can interact with - Christmas music, tons of visual special effects, and much more! Note: HTC Vive Headset and Controllers required to play the game Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
